messages.title: 3 great reasons to vote for Ed Sanderson
messages.content: Ed wants everyone in Leeds East, whatever their start in life, to be able to make a better life for themselves, their family and their community. Ed will work to bring more jobs to Leeds East to give everyone a decent standard of living in these difficult times. Ed is tenacious and will fight hard for your rights and will be the MP you need and deserve.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Finish the job of balancing the books on time and fairly. Cut income tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
Guarantee mental health equality by increased health spending of £8bn a year.
Protect education spending from cradle to college.

mentions.candidate: Help Ed Sanderson deliver even more

issues.economy: Finish the job of balancing the books on time and fairly. Cut income tax by a further £400 for ordinary workers.
issues.education: Protect education spending from cradle to college.
issues.health: Guarantee mental health equality by increased health spending of £8bn a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: Ed is tenacious and will fight hard for your rights and will be the MP you need and deserve.
